### Deployments & Changes
- No firmware updates or kernel patches performed
- Network drops recorded: 18 incidents
- Tenant cleanup: quota hard blocks reduced from 5 to 4; ongoing ingest caps for non-production namespaces

### Events
- Overnight compaction surge reduced pending from 122 to 98; disk busy p95 improved to 91.5%; scrub errors dropped to 24
- Disk failure on stor-c-14 replaced and rebuilt in 6.3 hours; ensured rebalancer avoided overloading rebuilding node
- Snapshot verification had one failure due to verifier worker eviction; pinned workers to dedicated hosts and re-verified successfully
- Tenant cleanup commitments lowered quota hard blocks from 5 to 4; continued ingest caps for non-production namespaces

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: Colton E. 6 pages. 12 tickets. Status: Stable; surge window helped. Still high utilization, but backlogs are trending down with ongoing tenant cleanup and improved verifier isolation
